sentences.sContent: The achievements and the remaining problems of the nucleon structure and nuclear force are reviewed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The achievements and the remaining problems of the nucleon structure and nuclear force are reviewed.
sentences.sCn: 评述了核子结构和核力研究取得的成就及存在的问题。

sentences.sContent: This might be caused by nuclear deformation and nucleon pair effect, and the experimental inaccuracy should not be neglected.
sentences.sContent_eng: This might be caused by nuclear deformation and nucleon pair effect, and the experimental inaccuracy should not be neglected.
sentences.sCn: 这可能是核形变及核子对效应造成的，试验中的测量误差也不可忽视。

sentences.sContent: Events recorded by the ALICE experiment from the first lead ion collisions at a centre-of-mass energy of 2.76 TeV per nucleon pair. (CERN LHC Alice Detector)
sentences.sContent_eng: Events recorded by the ALICE experiment from the first lead ion collisions at a centre-of-mass energy of 2.76 TeV per nucleon pair. (CERN LHC Alice Detector)
sentences.sCn: 图为欧洲核子研究中心的Alice探测器记录下的当 核子对 在中心物质能量为2.76电子伏下的首次铅离子碰撞试验

trans.tranOther: a proton or neutron, esp one present in an atomic nucleus
